subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rockies completed a rousing three-game sweep of the Philadelphia Phillies on Saturday and moved into the National League Championship Series with their 17th win in 18 games.
snippet: The Rockies completed a rousing three-game sweep of the Philadelphia Phillies on Saturday and moved into the National League Championship Series with their 17th win in 18 games.
